title: The Essential Path - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/27/19
itunes:title: The Essential Path - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/27/19
description:
George Noory and spiritual author Neale Donald Walsch explore his theories on why there is so much anger and alienation in the world today, and advice on how to change your life and attitude and make a difference.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
